subject: Tennis
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray was unstoppable against Roger Federer in the gold medal match in men’s singles, winning, 6-2, 6-1, 6-4, in only 1 hour 56 minutes.
snippet: Andy Murray was unstoppable against Roger Federer in the gold medal match in men’s singles, winning, 6-2, 6-1, 6-4, in only 1 hour 56 minutes.
